statements: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level < 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level < 10
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%'
SELECT product_name, price, inventory_level FROM products ORDER BY inventory_level ASC, price DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, name, description FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, name, price, quantity FROM products p LEFT JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY price DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT p.name, p.price, i.quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.quantity > 0 ORDER BY i.quantity DESC, p.price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT p.name, p.category, i.location FROM products p LEFT JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY p.category ASC, i.location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products INNER JOIN pricing ON products.product_id = pricing.product_id;
SELECT product_name, description, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price, discount FROM products LEFT JOIN pricing ON products.product_id = pricing.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE inventory.quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT name, price, discount FROM products JOIN prices ON products.product_id = prices.product_id WHERE prices.price >= 100;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products JOIN prices ON products.product_id = prices.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 5 ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products JOIN pricing ON products.product_id = pricing.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity > 0;

SELECT product_name, order_date, status FROM products JOIN order_details ON products.product_id = order_details.product_id JOIN orders ON order_details.order_id = orders.order_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, description, category FROM products WHERE brand = 'BrandX';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products p JOIN pricing pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.price < 100 ORDER BY pr.price ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.quantity > 0 AND i.location = 'Main Warehouse';
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, od.product_id, od.quantity, od.price FROM orders o JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
